channel.title: Comments on: A Blooming Porno
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: i just saw kevin smith in live free or die hard. that was unexpected! i could probly marry the fat ba@#$%^. my husband would probably let me.
item.content:encoded: i just saw kevin smith in live free or die hard. that was unexpected! i could probly marry the fat ba@#$%^. my husband would probably let me.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Some would say Jersey Girl or Clerks 2, but I liked those too.
item.content:encoded: Some would say Jersey Girl or Clerks 2, but I liked those too.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: a good kevin smith movie? is there a bad one out there that i haven't seen? clerks was good. chasing amy. mallrats. dogma. i can't think of a bad one.
item.content:encoded: a good kevin smith movie? is there a bad one out there that i haven’t seen? clerks was good. chasing amy. mallrats. dogma. i can’t think of a bad one.
